Class TeacherNotificationDAO

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.TeacherNotificationDAO
public class TeacherNotificationDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for handling notifications related to teachers. Includes methods for sending notifications, retrieving teacher info, and fetching notifications for users.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    TeacherNotificationDAO()
    Default constructor for the TeacherNotificationDAO class.

  • Constructor Details

    • TeacherNotificationDAO

      public TeacherNotificationDAO()
      Default constructor for the TeacherNotificationDAO class. Initializes the DAO for managing teacher notifications.

  • Method Details

    • getUserRoleByUserId

      public static String getUserRoleByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves the role of a user based on their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      the role of the user as a lowercase string; defaults to "user"

    • sendTeacherNotification

      public static void sendTeacherNotification(int teacherId, String eventMessage, String eventType, int senderUserId)
      Sends a notification to a teacher about an event.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher to notify
      eventMessage - the message describing the event
      eventType - the type/category of the notification
      senderUserId - the user ID of the sender

    • sendTeacherNotification

      public static void sendTeacherNotification(int teacherId, String eventMessage, String eventType)
      Sends a notification to a teacher using the current session's user as sender.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher to notify
      eventMessage - the message describing the event
      eventType - the type/category of the notification

    • getAllTeacherNames

      public static List<String> getAllTeacherNames()
      Retrieves all teacher full names for autocomplete or suggestion purposes.
      Returns:
      a list of teacher full names (first and last concatenated)

    • getUserIdByTeacherId

      public static int getUserIdByTeacherId(int teacherId)
      Retrieves the application user ID associated with a teacher ID.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the teacher's ID
      Returns:
      the associated user ID, or -1 if none found

    • getTeacherIdByName

      public static int getTeacherIdByName(String fullName)
      Retrieves the teacher ID corresponding to a full teacher name.
      Parameters:
      fullName - the full name of the teacher (first + last)
      Returns:
      the teacher ID, or -1 if not found

    • getSenderFullNameAndRole

      private static String getSenderFullNameAndRole(int userId, String role)
      Constructs a display string combining the sender's full name and role.
      Parameters:
      userId - the sender's user ID
      role - the sender's role (e.g., "teacher", "student", "admin")
      Returns:
      a string of the format "role FullName"

    • getNotificationsForUser

      public static List<Notification> getNotificationsForUser(int userId, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves a paginated list of notifications for a specific user, ordered by the date sent in descending order.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID for whom notifications are retrieved.
      offset - The number of rows to skip before starting to fetch the notifications.
      limit - The maximum number of notifications to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Notification objects for the user.

    • deleteNotificationById

      public static boolean deleteNotificationById(int notificationId)
      Deletes a notification from the database based on its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - The unique identifier of the notification to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the notification was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
